org.albertschmitt.crypto.common

Class Key

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.albertschmitt.crypto.common.Key
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RSAPrivateKey, RSAPublicKey

    public abstract class Key
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for strongly typed public and private rsa keys. This class was created to eliminate bouncycastle imports in classes that utilize the RSAService class.
    Author:
    Albert Schmitt [acschmit] [at] [gmail] [dot] [com]
